title: How to cook roast beef with Yorkshire puddings
description: A roast dinner doesn't have to take all day to prepare. This recipe will help take the stress out of Sunday lunch.
ingredients: 2.5kg/5½lb rib eye of beef, on the bone
2 tbsp duck fat or a drizzle of vegetable oil
salt and freshly ground black pepper
vegetable oil or beef dripping, melted
12 medium Maris Piper or King Edward potatoes
salt and freshly ground black pepper
